typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as integer,
		IDENTIFICACION as string,
		NombreCompletoGeneradorIrregularidad as string,
		NombreCompleto as string,
		CargoEntidad as string,
		PrimerNombre as string,
		SegundoNombre as string,
		PrimerApellido as string,
		SegundoApellido as string,
		OTROS as string,
		IDENTIFICACION_QUEJOSO as string,
		NOMBRE_COMPLETO_QUEJOSO as string,
		CargoEntidad_Quejoso as string,
		PrimerNombreQuejoso as string,
		SegundoNombreQuejoso as string,
		PrimerApellidoQuejoso as string,
		SegundoApellidoQuejoso as string,
		OTROSQUEJOSO as string,
		PROGRAMA as string,
		FORMA_INGRESO as string,
		FECHA_INGRESO as timestamp,
		LUGARDEATENCION as string,
		MUNICIPIO_dondesepresento_irregularidad as string,
		DEPARTAMENTO_dondesepresento_irregularidad as string,
		id_TIPO_CASO as integer,
		TIPO_CASO as string,
		ID_ASESOR as integer,
		ASESOR as string,
		FECHA_ASIGNACION as timestamp,
		OBSERVACIONES_ADMINISTRATIVO as string,
		INFORMACION_ACTUACIONES as string,
		ACCION as string,
		NO_RACIDICACION_ACCION as string,
		FECHA_RADICACION_ACCION as timestamp,
		No_NOTICIACRIMINAL as string,
		FISCALIA_ASIGNADA as string,
		UNIDADDEFISCALIAS as string,
		CIUDAD_DE_FISCALIA_AUTORIDAD_COMPETENTE as string,
		SOLICITUDES_FISCALIA_AUTORIDAD_COMPETENTE_ORFEO as string,
		PRUEBAS_APORTADAS_NoORFEO as string,
		OBSERVACIONES as string,
		ESTADO as string,
		{AÃ‘O_RECIBO} as integer,
		ESTADO_ACTUAL as string,
		FUENTE_RECURSOS as string,
		EXPEDIENTE as string,
		FECHA_RADICACION_FISCALIA as timestamp,
		ID_BUSQUEDA_ASESOR as integer,
		BUSQUEDA_DESCRIPCION as string,
		BUSQUEDA as string,
		VIGILANCIA as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> scBDdOAJ
scBDdOAJ select(mapColumn(
		TIPO_CASO
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> slTipoCasosCol
slTipoCasosCol aggregate(groupBy(TIPO_CASO),
	TIPO_CASO_1 = max(TIPO_CASO)) ~> agTipoCaso
agTipoCaso filter(isNull(TIPO_CASO) == false() || length(trim(TIPO_CASO)) > 0 || TIPO_CASO != '0') ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(input(
		id as integer,
		Tipo as string,
		Descripcion as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Tipo = TIPO_CASO,
		Descripcion = TIPO_CASO
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
